sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sink1
